channel.title: Teaching on Blue Visual v03
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching on Blue Visual v03

item.title: Problem Space Course
item.description: When it first opened, Houdini.School’s founder Deborah reached out to me to have me make a class. I was very busy at the time for many months but eventually in 2022 I was able to set aside some time to create a small syllabus and a cohesive theme enough to create a course for. Teaser for the course Problem Space is an atypical course more about concepts and thinking strategies rather than focused on a particular tutorial for an effect.
